name: typedoc-plugin-markdown
description: A plugin for Typedoc that exposes a theme and additional arguments for rendering markdown.

scripts.examples: rm -rf examples/out && typedoc ./examples/src --out ./examples/out --theme markdown --gitRevision master --readme none --media test/src/media/ --includes test/src/inc/
scripts.prepare: rm -rf dist && tsc -p ./src/tsconfig.json && npm run copy:static
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run prepare && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.pretest: rm -rf test/out && rm -rf node_modules/typedoc-plugin-markdown && npm run copy:plugin

author: Thomas Grey
